suncertify.util
Class ColorData

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--suncertify.util.ColorData
public class ColorData
extends java.lang.Object

Binds a specific color to a data object of any nature

Version:
1.2 27 Mar 2003
Author:
Francisco Carlos

Field Summary
private  java.awt.Color color
          Stores the corresponding color of a object
private  java.lang.Object data
          Stores the object
private static java.awt.Color GREEN
          Default color indicates a normal current status for object
private static java.awt.Color RED
          Default color indicates a anormal current status for object
 
Constructor Summary
ColorData(java.awt.Color color, java.lang.Object data)
          Sets Color and Object parameters and assigns them to the instance variables color and data, respectively
ColorData(java.lang.Double data)
          Sets a Double parameter which is to data, and color is assigned the green color if the parameter is positive,and red one if the parameter is negative
ColorData(java.lang.Integer data)
          Sets a Double parameter which is assigned to data, and color is assigned the green color if the parameter is positive,and red one if the parameter is negative
